short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use WorldSmart to make phone calls from the Chrome browser and from within Microsoft Teams application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The WorldSmart Communications Extension adds the following features to the Chrome browser:
1)	Click to Call feature allows users to make a phone call by click on any phone number (10 digits or more) on a web page.
2)	Microsoft Teams Integration allows MS Teams users to make calls using Streams within the Teams interface.
